short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get accurate citations for a webpage in APA, MLA, and Chicago format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is powered by penandthepad.com and gives an instant citation for a webpage.  Users can choose between APA, MLA, and Chicago style citation formats.
